properties.description: Object with references to relevant element nodes
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: Whether the single tabs have the option to be closed or not
properties.name: closable

properties.description: Whether the user wants the tabs to be draggables or not
properties.name: dragging

properties.description: Position in which the user wants the tabs scrolls located
properties.name: tabsScroll

methods.description: Creates a tab for the provided panel
methods.name: _createPanelTab

methods.description: Creates all the events for the tab (click, close, drag...)
methods.name: _createTabEvents

methods.description: Returns a sibling for the requested tab
methods.name: _getSiblingTab

methods.description: Handles the drag end and adds the tab to its new location
methods.name: _handleDragEnd

methods.description: Handles the mouse over event when dragging over the tabs
methods.name: _handleDragOver

methods.description: Handles the start of the tab dragging
methods.name: _handleDragStart

methods.description: Enables/disabled the tabs scroll
methods.name: _handleTabsScrollsStatus

methods.description: Removes the tab from the DOM but saves it in our object so that it can be restored again
methods.name: _hide

methods.description: Searches the panels and appends them in the stack element
methods.name: _importPanels

methods.description: Reasigns an order to the tabs
methods.name: _reorderTabs

methods.description: Makes the requested tab visible and shows its content
methods.name: _selectTab

methods.description: Sets up some basic steps for the dragging to take place
methods.name: _setupDragging

methods.description: Creates references to relevant nodes
methods.name: _setupRefs

methods.description: Sets up the scrolls positions and its events
methods.name: _setupScrolls

methods.description: Appends the stack component and creates the corresponding panel tabs
methods.name: _setupTabs

methods.description: Deselects the tab that is currently selected
methods.name: _unselectActiveTab

methods.description: Completely removes the tab from the dom and its panel
methods.name: _wipeout

methods.description: Creates a tab for the provided panel
methods.name: addPanel

methods.description: Closes the requested tab and selects its sibling
methods.name: close

methods.description: Returns the active panel
methods.name: getActivePanel

methods.description: Returns the requested panel
methods.name: getPanel

methods.description: Hides the requested tab and selects its sibling
methods.name: hide

methods.description: Restores the requested tab
methods.name: restore

methods.description: Handles the tabs scrolling
methods.name: scroll

methods.description: Unselects the current tab and selects the requested one
methods.name: select
